mapper.insert: INSERT INTO annual_leave (mem_id, year, total_days, use_days, remain_days, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{memId}, #{year}, #{totalDays}, #{useDays}, #{remainDays}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT an_id, mem_id, year, total_days, use_days, remain_days, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM annual_leave WHERE mem_id = #{memId} AND year = #{hireYear}
